sentence: Amb els bassal-s, es pot veure clarament que ahir al vespre va ploure.
glosses_en: with DEF.PL.M puddle(M)-PL, REFL be_able.PRS.3SG see.INF clearly that yesterday to.DEF.SG.M night(M) go.PRS.3SG rain.INF
back_translation_en: Because of the puddles, it is possible to see clearly that yesterday night it was raining.
glosses_ru: с DEF.PL.M лужа(M)-PL REFL мочь.PRS.3SG видеть.INF ясно что вчера в.DEF.SG.M ночь(M) идти.PRS.3SG идти(о дожде).INF
back_translation_ru: По лужам ясно видно, что вчера ночью шел дождь.

sentence: Ten-int en compte les bomboll-es, l' aigu-a bull.

sentence: Entra a dins, perquè fa fred.
glosses_en: enter.IMP.2SG to inside, because do.PRS.3SG cold(F).SG

comments: This translation is not included in the database because the causing event is expressed as a dependent clause, not a noun phrase.

sentence: Matemàticament, aquest número no pot ser menor d' u.
glosses_en: mathematically, this.SG.M number(M).SG NEG be_able.PRS.3SG be.INF less from one(M).SG
